article_title: Where Should We Seat Those Awful Wedding Guests?
article_text:
Dear Dan,

My fiancé and I are realizing that we’re going to have to invite some awful people to our wedding. These are close relatives whom we love despite everything, but they often say or do crummy things at parties. We estimate that they’ll make up about 4% of our guests at a 150-person wedding. So how should we arrange the table seating for maximum guest happiness? Should we put all of the troublemakers together, spread them...
